name: Mr. Mime
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: Its pantomime skills are wonderful. You may become enraptured while watching it, but next thing you know, Mr. Mime has made a real wall.

abilities.name: Scoop-Up Block
abilities.effect: Your opponent’s Pokémon that have any damage counters on them, and any cards attached to those Pokémon, can’t be put into your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
